title: Jerry Sandusky’s Son, Jeff Sandusky, Charged with Sexual Abuse of a Child - NBC News
text:
Jerry Sandusky’s Son, Jeff Sandusky, Charged with Sexual Abuse of a Child 
The son of Jerry Sandusky, Jeff, was charged Monday with the sexual abuse of a child according to court records. Additional charges include child pornography, criminal solicitation and corruption of a minor. Previous
